name: Seaside Demolition
description:
Seaside Demolition is an angry-birds style game in which you have to destroy the enemy sand castle while evading obstacles and using the environment to your advantage. Along the way you will find new ways to help you get to the end, as well as new challenges that make it more difficult.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys - Controls the angle and power of the canon

SPACE - Shoot Canon
